name: fisherman (itch) (dgr)
description:
A lone fisherman. 

Searching for the unknown. A single companion to light the way. Throw your precious bone to find what was lost. Be ready for the horrors that seek to snuff out your light.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

  • ESC to bring up the menu
  • Left click + drag to throw the bone. The white line indicates the direction and velocity the bone will be thrown in
  • Left click to swipe net when ghosts are above the boat

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Notes:

Sorry for the lack of controls in the initial description/game! We were trying to get it in before the deadline and had to submit it as is. We're planning on updating the game to fix bugs and other annoying things :)
